lines.text: [the Spider's henchmen have kidnapped Gordon, Dick Tracy's brother, and Moloch prepares to begin a mind-altering medical procedure]
Then we will eliminate a very dangerous enemy.
He won't die, but by means of this operation - a simple altering of certain glands - he will be unable to distinguish between right and wrong.
In that event, he will be very useful to us, Moloch, very useful.
Brother against brother - one good, one evil. Ahh, I wonder which will win?
That was a pretty good tackle you made there, son.
Aw, gee, that was nothing. But, say, you sure can use a gun! You're Dick Tracy, aren't you?
I'm just an orphan. Some day I'm gonna be a G-Man, too!
Well, now's a good time to start. Come along.
Have you seen anything of Junior? Oh, there you are! Why aren't you get on the bus with the others? Everyone was terribly worried, you bad boy!
I'd like to keep this little rascal with me for a while, Miss. You see, he can identify one of the men that got away, and his life won't be safe until this matter is cleared up.
